title: AVAIL 9/1! MODERN JP 2 bed near Orange Line T ~NO FEE~
posting_body: ['Live in this gorgeous and modern Egleston Square luxury apartment community in hip Jamaica Plain.', 'Less than 1/2 mile to Orange Line T and close to the Sam Adams Brewery complex, Franklin Park Zoo, and tons of shops, restaurants, bars, and entertainment on Washington and Centre St.', 'Along with your brand new apartment, you will have access to the following community amenities: - Conference room-', 'Work stations-', 'Resident library-', 'Roof Deck with BBQs- Courtyard with firepit-', 'Clubroom with indoor fireplace-', 'Fitness Center- Pet wash station-', 'Garage parking', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Please contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for more info or to schedule a tour.', 'NO FEE.', 'Open floor plan 2 bed/2 bath.', 'Hard surface flooring in the living area with carpet in the bedrooms.', 'Walk through closet in main bedroom with ensuite bathroom.', '2nd bedroom has large closet.', 'Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and dining area.', 'Great natural light through the expansive windows.', 'Full-size washer/dryer in unit.', 'Contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for more information or to schedule a tour.', 'Amenities:', '- Parking - $225', '- Exercise Facility', '- Courtyard', '- Clubroom w/ work from home space and resident kitchen', '- Smoke Free', '- Elevator in Building', '- Roof Deck', 'Appliances:', '- Air Conditioning', '- Dishwasher', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Microwave', '- Range', '- Refrigerator', '- Washer and Dryer', 'LeaseLengths:', '- 12 Months lease', 'Pets:', '- Cats Allowed - $40/month', '- Small Dogs Allowed - $75/month', '- Large Dogs Allowed - $75/month', 'Utilities:', '- Resident Pays Electricity', '- Resident Pays Heat', '- Resident Pays Water', 'Contact Hartley Realty Group at (774) 571-8432 for more information']
